name: Need for Split
description:
Need for Split!

You control a simple square. Try to get as many coins as you can through 4 stages. You can split your body (up and down) in order to reach for more!

Controls:

  • W/S or Up/Down to move.
  • A/S or Left/Right to split. 
  • If you split too much, you can click A until you're one again.
